parameters.name: AssetAddress
parameters.description: The IP address of the asset that is contained in the O\&M application to be reviewed.

parameters.name: InstanceId
parameters.description:
The ID of the bastion host.

>  You can call the [DescribeInstances](~~153281~~) operation to query the ID of the bastion host.

parameters.name: PageNumber
parameters.description: The number of the page. Default value: **1**.

parameters.name: PageSize
parameters.description:
The number of entries per page.\
Maximum value: 1000. Default value: 20. If you leave this parameter empty, 20 entries are returned on each page.

>  We recommend that you do not leave this parameter empty.

parameters.name: RegionId
parameters.description:
The region ID of the bastion host.

>  For more information about the mapping between region IDs and region names, see [Regions and zones](~~40654~~).
